Display the npm version npm --version
npm -v
Create a package.json file npm init
Return the npm global path npm root -g

BLIST.TITLE: -save options
BLIST.ITEM:
Install foobar as a development dependency, it will be recorded in the devDependencies section of package.json npm install --save-dev foobar
npm install -D foobar
Install foobar as a deployment dependency, it will be recorded in the dependencies section of package.json npm install --save foobar
Install foobar without updating package.json npm install foobar alias npm i foobar
